content: free pattern green monster demiwool materials abbreviations 1 yarn i use xuefeier mini r round chenille yarn with the yarn magic_ring magic_ring thickness of 3 0mm st stitch 2 hook size 3 0mm chain chain 3 fiberfill single_crochet single_crochet 4 stitch markers increase increase 5 yarn needle decrease decrease 6 scissors slip_stitch slip_stitch 7 pins optional blo back loop only size color if you use the same yarn as green black blue white me the finished monster orange a little bit of pink will be around 12cm/ yarn to embroider the 4 7inch tall nose and cheeks demiwool legs make 2 using green yarn leg 1 r1 magic_ring 6sc 6 r2 6inc 12 r3 blo 12sc 12 r4 - 5 2 rounds 12sc 12 fasten_off cut the yarn and weave it in leg 2 crochet same as leg 1 but do not cut the yarn we will connect to 2 legs together and make the body pic 1 01 demiwool body r1 from the last stitch of the second leg ch2 connect with the last stitch of r5 of the first leg with 1sc pic 2 then continue to crochet 11sc left on the first leg total 12sc on the first leg 2sc on the chain 12sc around the second leg we finish the first round of the body here now we have total 28sc for r1 12sc x 2 legs + 2sc on chain x 2 pic 3 02 03 demiwool body cont r2 3sc increase x 7 35 r3 4sc increase x 7 42 r4 5sc increase x 7 49 r5 - 15 11 rounds 49sc 49 stuff the legs and the body and continue to stuff as you go 04 r16 5sc decrease x 7 42 r17 42sc 42 r18 4sc decrease x 7 35 r19 3sc decrease x 7 28 r20 2sc decrease x 7 21 r21 single_crochet decrease x 7 14 r22 7dec 7 stuff the body firmly fasten_off cut the yarn close the remaining gap and weave the yarn in pic 4 demiwool eye start with black yarn at the end of each round slip_stitch into the first stitch ch1 and continue with the next round this will help the eye look rounder compared to working in a spiral 05 r1 magic_ring 7sc slip_stitch 7 r2 ch1 7inc slip_stitch 14 r3 ch1 single_crochet increase x 7 slip_stitch 21 switch to blue yarn r4 ch1 single_crochet increase single_crochet x 7 slip_stitch 28 r5 ch1 3sc increase x 7 slip_stitch 35 switch to white yarn r6 ch1 2sc increase 2sc x 7 42 at the end of r6 instead of making a slip_stitch finish with an invisible fasten_off cut the yarn and leave a long tail for sewing use white yarn to embroider a white spot on the eye at r3 of the eye pic 5 demiwool arms make 2 using green yarn r1 magic_ring 6sc 6 r2 2sc increase x 2 8 r3 3sc increase x 2 10 r4 - 5 2 rounds 10sc 10
